name: Deluxe Birthday Package
description: Make your birthday memorable with our deluxe package. Includes premium decorations, cake, and entertainment.

name: Themed Extravaganza
description: Transform your celebration with a themed extravaganza. Choose from a variety of themes to suit your style.

name: VIP Birthday Experience
description: Indulge in a VIP birthday experience with exclusive services, luxury decor, and personalized attention.

name: Outdoor Picnic Party
description: Celebrate in the great outdoors with our picnic party package. Enjoy nature and festivities in one.

name: Virtual Celebration
description: Host a virtual birthday celebration with friends and family. Virtual games, surprises, and shared moments.

name: DIY Celebration Kit
description: Create your celebration at home with our DIY kit. Decorations, cake mix, and party essentials included.
